params._id: The ID of the Authorship Token to burn.

returns.puzzleId: The ID of the puzzle corresponding to Fermat.
returns.timeTaken: The number of seconds it took to solve the puzzle.

returns.addedTimestamp: The timestamp at which the puzzle was added.
returns.firstSolveTimestamp: The timestamp at which the first solution was submitted.

returns._0: The address of the puzzle author.

returns.colors: A bitpacked `uint120` of 5 24-bit colors for the puzzle's Flags.
returns.phase0Solves: The total number of Phase 0 solves a puzzle has.
returns.phase1Solves: The total number of Phase 1 solves a puzzle has.
returns.phase2Solves: The total number of Phase 2 solves a puzzle has.
returns.solves: The total number of solves a puzzle has.

returns._0: Whether `_solver` has solved the puzzle of ID `_puzzleId`.

params._tokenId: The ID of an Authorship Token.

returns._0: Whether the Authorship Token of ID `_tokenId` has been used to add a puzzle.

setFermat(uint32).details: The puzzle of ID `_puzzleId` must have been solved at least once.

setPuzzleColors(uint32,uint120).details: Only the author of the puzzle of ID `_puzzleId` may set its token renderer.

params._colors: A bitpacked `uint120` of 5 24-bit colors for the puzzle's Flags.

addPuzzle(address,uint256).notice: Adds a puzzle to the contract. Note that an unused Authorship Token is required to add a puzzle (see {AuthorshipToken}).

flagRenderer().notice: The Flag metadata and art renderer contract.

setFermat(uint32).notice: Burns and mints NFT #0 to the author of the puzzle of ID `_puzzleId` if it is the puzzle that went longest unsolved.

setPuzzleColors(uint32,uint120).notice: Set the colors for a puzzle's Flags.

solve(uint32,uint256).notice: Mints a Flag NFT if the provided solution solves the puzzle.

documentation.text: @notice Emitted when a puzzle's solution is incorrect.

@notice Emitted when insufficient funds are sent during "Phase 2"
 submissions.

@notice Emitted when a puzzle is already marked as Fermat.
 @param _puzzleId The ID of a puzzle.

@notice Emitted when a solver has already solved a puzzle.
 @param _puzzleId The ID of a puzzle.

@notice Emitted when a puzzle does not exist.
 @param _puzzleId The ID of a puzzle.

@notice Emitted when a puzzle has not been solved yet.
 @param _puzzleId The ID of a puzzle.

@notice Emitted when submissions for a puzzle is closed.
 @param _puzzleId The ID of a puzzle.
@notice Emitted when `msg.sender` is not authorized.
@notice The Flag metadata and art renderer contract.
@return The Authorship Token contract.
@return The total number of puzzles.

@return puzzleId The ID of the puzzle corresponding to Fermat.
 @return timeTaken The number of seconds it took to solve the puzzle.

@param _puzzleId The ID of a puzzle.
 @return The address of the puzzle author.
